description:
Provides access to Civic Plus - See Click Fix,  allowing you to interact with your data via an LLM. 

Developed and maintained by Sigao.

debug.description: Enable debug mode. If TRUE, the server will use the 'crm-int' subdomain for See Click Fix API requests.

orgId.description: The organization ID for See Click Fix. Note: if debug is TRUE, this should be the ID for your Sandbox instance.

serviceUserName.description: The email address/username of the service account that will make changes in See Click Fix

serviceUserPassword.description: The password of the service account that will make changes in See Click Fix

capabilities.name: getIssue
capabilities.description: Get a single issue by its ID from SeeClickFix

capabilities.name: getIssues
capabilities.description: Get a list of issues from SeeClickFix with optional date filtering

capabilities.name: getRequestTypes
capabilities.description: Step 1 of 3 when creating a new issue. The user must provide a location to get the request types available in that area.

capabilities.name: getRequestTypeDetails
capabilities.description: Step 2 of 3 when creating a new issue. Use the information requirements that are returned to prompt the user for that information.

capabilities.name: createIssueWithDetails
capabilities.description: Step 3 of 3 when creating a new issue. Use the information collected from the user to create the issue.

capabilities.name: flagIssue
capabilities.description: Flag an issue as inappropriate or problematic in SeeClickFix

capabilities.name: followIssue
capabilities.description: Follow an issue to receive notifications about updates in SeeClickFix

capabilities.name: updateIssue
capabilities.description: Update an existing issue in SeeClickFix

capabilities.name: addComment
capabilities.description: Add a comment to an issue in SeeClickFix

capabilities.name: getComments
capabilities.description: Get all comments for a specific issue in SeeClickFix

capabilities.name: closeIssue
capabilities.description: Close an issue in SeeClickFix with a closing comment

capabilities.name: reopenIssue
capabilities.description: Reopen a closed issue in SeeClickFix with a comment

capabilities.name: acknowledgeIssue
capabilities.description: Acknowledge an issue in SeeClickFix with a comment

capabilities.name: changeLocation
capabilities.description: Change the location of an existing issue in SeeClickFix

capabilities.name: getCurrentTime
capabilities.description: Get the current date and time
